message:
Dear {{ doc.applicant_name }},

Thank you for your interest in joining {{ doc.custom_company }}. We are pleased to receive your application and are excited about the possibility of you becoming part of our team.

In order to proceed with your application, we have created a personalized Candidate Portal for you. Kindly follow the link provided in your email to complete your profile and submit any additional required information.

If you encounter any issues or have any questions during the process, please do not hesitate to contact us. Our HR team is available to assist you and ensure a smooth application experience.

We look forward to reviewing your application in more detail and wish you the best of luck in the selection process.

Best regards,
The {{ doc.custom_company }} HR Team
name: Job Applicant Registration Mail
subject: You're One Step Closer! Complete Your Job Application at {{ doc.company }}
